title: Configuration file
description: Contains global configurations for the program

projects.description: A list of projects which should be used for dataset creation. Can also be a string pointing to a json file containing these project definitions.

mainOutputDir.description: The main output dir containing some processing results and the final dataset

defaultLibraries.description: A list of mapping files in csv format for default java libraries (and other libraries to use)

defaultTypeClasses.description: A file containg type mappings and the final labels

forceExtraction.description: If true, will always recollect the data from the crawled xml files

datasetSize.description: The size of the splitted datasets as a proportion. Will probably be replaced with new dataset configuration files.

datasetMethodFilter.description: Method filtering options for dataset creation. Will probably be replaced with new dataset configuration files.

strictMode.description: If true, the program will stop running when an error occurs which may influence the dataset output

excelSets.description: Configuration for excel sets. Can also be a string pointing to a json file containing these excel set definitions.
